meta.title: Stop Golden Retriever Pulling on Leash: Easy Training
meta.description: Is your Golden Retriever dragging you down the street? Learn effective loose-leash walking techniques and the best no-pull harnesses.

h1: How to Stop Your Golden Retriever From Pulling on Leash
overview: Goldens are strong and enthusiastic. Without training, walks can become a tug-of-war. Teaching loose-leash walking makes outings enjoyable for both.
causes: Reinforcement (pulling gets them where they want to go)

solutions.title: Stop and Stand Still
solutions.description: If the leash goes tight, stop moving. Only move forward when the leash is slack.

solutions.title: Use a Front-Clip Harness
solutions.description: A front-clip harness redirects their momentum towards you when they pull.

solutions.title: Reward Check-Ins
solutions.description: Treat your dog heavily for looking at you and walking by your side.
